## Hydraulics, Pneumatics and Mechatronics

NEUWALME is a global provider of value-added solutions for industrial motion applications based on oil-hydraulic, pneumatic and mechatronic technologies.

PRODUCTS AND SERVICES


Hydraulic, pneumatic and electrical systems

Our engineers propose innovative and lasting solutions for the needs of each client.

[![](https://www.neuwalme.com/cms/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/right-arrow.png)](https://www.neuwalme.com/en/systems/)

PRODUCTS AND SERVICES


Specialist

technical

services

NEUWALME offers a complete engineering service, covering the specification of the pipe, design of the installation, bill of materials and technical documentation.

[![](https://www.neuwalme.com/cms/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/img_arrow_verde.png)](https://www.neuwalme.com/en/specialist-technical-services/)

PRODUCTS AND SERVICES


Sale of

elements and

components

We have a large stock of oil-hydraulic components and materials and accessories. We are Premier Level Parker Distributors.

[![](https://www.neuwalme.com/cms/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/img_arrow_blanco.png)](https://www.neuwalme.com/en/sale-of-elements-and-components/)

![](https://www.neuwalme.com/cms/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/icon_energia.png)

We move the energy that makes the industry flow


[CONOCE LOS SECTORES](https://www.neuwalme.com/en/sectors/)

ALL ABOUT NEUWALME


Our operations cover all stages of work with the client:

1. Technical and Commercial Consulting

2. R&D, Engineering and Design

3. Technical Procurement

4. Logistics

5. Manufacturing

6. Assembly on site

7. Technical Support

[MÁS INFORMACIÓN](https://www.neuwalme.com/en/work-process/)

[![i+d_3](https://www.neuwalme.com/cms/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/id_3-1.jpg)](https://www.neuwalme.com/cms/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/id_3-1.jpg "i+d_3")

![](https://www.neuwalme.com/cms/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/img_magazine.png)

## [See our updated catalogues](https://www.neuwalme.com/en/see-our-updated-catalogues/)

[Present](https://www.neuwalme.com/en/category/present/)

Our corporate catalogues have been updated in both Spanish and English. Do you want to have a look? Go to the following links for the catalogue in Spanish and for the catalogue in English. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact us!

[read more](https://www.neuwalme.com/en/see-our-updated-catalogues/)

## [Neuwalme, the global supplier that conquered Parker](https://www.neuwalme.com/en/neuwalme-the-global-supplier-that-conquered-parker/)

[Present](https://www.neuwalme.com/en/category/present/), [Talk about us](https://www.neuwalme.com/en/category/talk-about-us/)

The Digital Economy website, in its February section: "Atlas of business innovation" reports on the trajectory and evolution of Neuwalme. Here is the article. You can also find it here Founded in 1982 by Francisco Vaquero, the Neuwalme company from Vigo has evolved to...

[read more](https://www.neuwalme.com/en/neuwalme-the-global-supplier-that-conquered-parker/)

## [We attended MINDTECH 2019](https://www.neuwalme.com/en/we-attended-mindtech-2019/)

[Innovation](https://www.neuwalme.com/en/category/innovation/), [Present](https://www.neuwalme.com/en/category/present/)

In September, we had the pleasure of attending the MINDTECH fair: Metal Industry and Technologies International Trade Fair organised by ASIME (the Galician Association of Metal Industries) at IFEVI (Vigo Trade Fair Grounds), Spain. Over 20,000 visitors came to...

[read more](https://www.neuwalme.com/en/we-attended-mindtech-2019/)

[See all news](https://www.neuwalme.com/en/blog-2/)

[![img_32](https://www.neuwalme.com/cms/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/img_32.jpg)](https://www.neuwalme.com/cms/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/img_32.jpg "img_32")

ALL ABOUT NEUWALME


Founded in 1982, NEUWALME began as a family business with Spanish private capital.

[MÁS INFORMACIÓN](https://www.neuwalme.com/en/about-us/)

![](https://www.neuwalme.com/cms/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/img_experiencia-1.png)

Privacy Overview

![Neuwalme](https://www.neuwalme.com/cms/wp-content/plugins/gdpr-cookie-compliance/dist/images/gdpr-logo.png)

This website uses cookies so that we can provide you with the best user experience possible. Cookie information is stored in your browser and performs functions such as recognising you when you return to our website and helping our team to understand which sections of the website you find most interesting and useful.

Strictly Necessary Cookies

Strictly Necessary Cookie should be enabled at all times so that we can save your preferences for cookie settings.

If you disable this cookie, we will not be able to save your preferences. This means that every time you visit this website you will need to enable or disable cookies again.
